name: Of Straw, Sticks, and Stones
description:
You are a humble Architectural Housing Inspector tasked with the honor of inspecting the newly built Straw House of Mrs. Barley Bale, widow of Rye Bale who the Big Bad Wolf killed. However, your day is turned upside down when you're faced with a conspiracy that lands you smack dab in the middle of a moral dilemma you never asked for.

Play through this investigative mystery to find the truth behind Rye Bale's death and the many twists, turns, and knots that make up the whole story!

Who will you believe? What will you decide to do?
